content:
## Misc roles
- ☎️ <@&650330610358943755>
  if you're a <@&350483752490631181> and you would like to take part in some statistical questions we ask from time to time
- 🎮 <@&357714047698993162>
  if you'd like to be notified about game discounts or events in <#357713113321046016>
- 🗣️ <@&886625423167979541>
  if you'd like to be pinged to join voice chats. You may also ping others.
- 📚 <@&928364890601685033>
  if you'd like to join the Book Club. You will be pinged when meetings take place.
